attributes.action: request the Prime Minster asks the Queen to dissolve Parliament, on the basis that the Honourable Members are no longer Honourable, and not fit for purpose.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the action taken by some MPs in falsely claiming for expenses from the public purse, that have only now (thanks to the FOIA) come to light.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
